name: Baked Broccoli Parmesan Dip
description: Baked Broccoli Parmesan Dip – A wonderfully hot and cheesy broccoli dip that is sure to be a crowd pleaser!
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly oil a 9-inch baking dish or coat with nonstick spray.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly oil a 9-inch baking dish or coat with nonstick spray.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add Panko and cook, stirring, until browned and toasted, about 3 minutes; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add Panko and cook, stirring, until browned and toasted, about 3 minutes; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, broccoli, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, sour cream, Parmesan, milk, Emeril’s Essence, garlic powder and onion powder; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, broccoli, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, sour cream, Parmesan, milk, Emeril’s Essence, garlic powder and onion powder; season with salt and pepper, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread broccoli mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup cheddar cheese. Place into oven and bake until bubbly, about 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread broccoli mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup cheddar cheese. Place into oven and bake until bubbly, about 20-25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, sprinkled with Panko, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, sprinkled with Panko, if desired.

review.reviewBody: My daughter introduced this dip to me and I am so happy she did.  Super tasty and gooey.
